SELECT DISTINCT A.BASE_CROSS_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CROSS_START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') CROSS_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CROSS_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') CROSS_END_DATE, A.CROSS_NAME, B.BASE_TRAIN_ID, B.TRAIN_SORT, B.DAY_GAP, B.ALTERNATE_TRAIN_NBR, B.TRAIN_NBR, B.START_STN, B.START_BUREAU, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.RUN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' '|| (SELECT TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:ss') FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_SITEM T WHERE T.NAME = B.START_STN AND T.PARENT_ID = B.BASE_TRAIN_ID) START_TIME, B.END_STN, B.END_BUREAU, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' '|| (SELECT TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:ss') FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_TITEM T WHERE T.NAME = B.END_STN AND T.PARENT_ID = B.BASE_TRAIN_ID) END_TIME, B.ALTERNATE_TIME, B.SPARE_FLAG, B.SPARE_APPLY_FLAG, C.ID, C.STN_NAME, C.STN_SORT, C.STN_BUREAU, C.STN_BUREAU_FULL, C.ARR_TIME, C.DPT_TIME, C.TRACK_NAME
FROM ( SELECT t.ID, t.parent_id BASE_TRAIN_ID, T.CHILD_INDEX STN_SORT, T.NAME STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname STN_BUREAU, T.Bureau_Name STN_BUREAU_FULL, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') TIME, O.RUN_DATE || ' ' ||TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') ARR_TIME, O.RUN_DATE || ' ' ||TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') DPT_TIME, 0 run_days, T.TRACK_NAME FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_SITEM T, (select A.BASE_TRAIN_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(A.RUN_DATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') RUN_DATE from BASE_CROSS_TRAIN A WHERE A.BASE_CROSS_ID =#{baseCrossId} GROUP BY A.BASE_TRAIN_ID) O WHERE t.parent_id = O.BASE_TRAIN_ID UNION ALL SELECT t.ID, t.parent_id BASE_TRAIN_ID, T.CHILD_INDEX STN_SORT, T.NAME STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname STN_BUREAU, T.Bureau_Name STN_BUREAU_FULL, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') TIME, O.END_DATE || ' ' ||TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') ARR_TIME, O.END_DATE || ' ' ||TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') DPT_TIME, t.relative_time_day run_days, T.TRACK_NAME FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_TITEM T, (select A.BASE_TRAIN_ID,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(A.END_DATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')END_DATE from BASE_CROSS_TRAIN A WHERE A.BASE_CROSS_ID =#{baseCrossId} GROUP BY A.BASE_TRAIN_ID) O WHERE t.parent_id = O.BASE_TRAIN_ID ) C, BASE_CROSS_TRAIN B, BASE_CROSS A WHERE B.BASE_CROSS_ID = A.BASE_CROSS_ID AND B.BASE_TRAIN_ID = C.BASE_TRAIN_ID AND A.BASE_CROSS_ID =#{baseCrossId} ORDER BY A.BASE_CROSS_ID,B.TRAIN_SORT,C.STN_SORT

mapper.update: update base_cross set check_time = sysdate where base_cross_id in (${baseCrossIds})
